title: Black Angel logo
content:
Hi there clever people...   
Can anyone help me identify the font used to create this logo...i need it as vector art and unfortunately my client, being a client, doesn't understand what i'm talking about and can't help me. Your help would be much appreciated.   
thanks...kath ![black angel logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803003811im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/34131.jpg)
author: kaff

comments.content:
Hi Kathy, I fear this is some obscure freefont, as it's   
not very well designed, so the chances for it to get   
identified are pretty slim. Sorry that we can't help   
you out.
